[[Punk rock|Punk]] | Producer = Buck Brothers and Kennan Keating | This album = '''''We Are Merely Filters'''''
(2010) | Last album = ''[[Me (Buck Brothers album)|Me]]''
(2007) }} '''''We Are Merely Filters''''' is the second album by British band [[Buck Brothers]]. So far from the album, two singles ('''When I Look At You (All I Think About Is Sex)''' and '''You're So Good, Good, Good You're Great''') have been released and a third ('''[[Pop Muzik]]''') is due for release. It was released digitally on the 5th of April 2010 and physically in the UK on June 28th 2010. == Track listing == #"All I Want To Do" #"Are You In?" #"When I Look At You (All I Think About Is Sex)" #"All The Things" #"Heartfelt By Numbers" #"No More Yesterdays" #"She's Not Wearing Any" #"You're So Good, Good, Good You're Great" #"Remission" #"[[Pop Muzik]]" #"Deeply Shallow" == External links == *[http://www.buckbrothers.net/ Official site] *[http://www.wearemerelyfilters.com/ Official blog] *{{myspace|buckbrothers|Buck Brothers}} [[Category:2010 albums]]
